title: After playing the new Gragas, my opinion on the nerfs
body: To be completely honest, the ultimate nerfs seem completely fair now. I understand that they felt that they needed to add counterplay to his e-ult combo, but i feel like the nerfs to his e were just a little overkill. Thoughts?

replies.body: It's decent, all it does is ensure he can't chase as well with E after fights break down. If the ult nerf was too significant, I could see them reimbursing the E nerf some.
Well, considering now you can actually survive his combo, i am happy. Nothing more annoying then being 2 shotted by full tank grag :/
